attributes.action: Increase wages of NHS staff members
attributes.additional_details: The NHS has been at its service throughout this whole global pandemic.It has supported us all at least once in our lives but sometimes they are not seen with much importance, little do we know how much of a vital role the NHS has in our families, our lives and our country. This is why we truly believe that the Government should increase wages of NHS staff members.
attributes.background: We want the government to increase wages of those that work in the NHS by a substantial amount due to the importance in which they have place during this unprecedented global pandemic.
